summary: This simple mod allows you to pick a vampire "race" from character generation. Only works for vanilla races.
descriptionHtml:
Basically, this makes the Vampire versions of races into choosable races during character creation. By ticking the "Playable" flag on the xRaceVampire "races", and recreating all of the presets for each race, I've made it so that you should be able to pick a vampirism-enabled race of your choosing and play as a vampire from the start.

This took a lot longer than it should have. :P I've also removed the red vampirism marks from vampires' faces. I'll upload a version that's closer to vanilla if there's any demand.

Let me know if you find any problems or if the mod simply doesn't work.

Requires Dawnguard!
author: MCGONN
